quote.quotetext: Where you can starve to death in safety,
Think the old man was feeling sentimental this morning,
Well, we all feel a little closer today, don't we?
We could do it, you know,
You and I, we could make it,
If we didn't have so many kids,
I never want to have kids,
What do you want to do?
We can leave our poles and gather in the woods.
Once it's in the soup, I'll call it beef,
Well, if I end up going to the Capitol, I want to look nice, don't I?
You won't be going to the Capitol,
I had six when I was just twelve years old.
It's to the Capitol's advantage to have us divided among ourselves,
Let's put your hair up, too,
Tuck your tail in, little duck,
Look how we take your children and sacrifice them and there's nothing you can do.
If you lift a finger, we will destroy every last one of you.
Just as we did in District Thirteen.
It is both a time for repentance and a time for thanks,
And may the odds be ever in your favor!
But there are still thousands of slips,
But I believe there's a small matter of introducing the reaping winner and then asking for volunteers, and if one does come forth then we, um...
That's the spirit of the Games!
I bet my buttons that was your sister.
Don't want her to steal all the glory, do we?
Let's give a big round of applause to our newest tribute!
It's time to choose our boy tribute!
Feed it to the pig, you stupid creature!
No one decent will buy burned bread!
Well, you have to help it this time.
You can't clock out and leave Prim on her own.
There's no me now to keep you both alive.
Whatever you see on the screen.
You have to promise me you'll fight through it!
I could have treated myself if I'd had the medicine I have now.
But you have to take care, too.
Then we'd be rich as Haymitch.
I don't care if we're rich.
I just want you to come home.
I had some of your bread this morning.
My friend Gale gave you a squirrel for it.
I'll keep an eye on the little girl.
They let you wear one thing from your district in the arena.
One thing to remind you of home.
Here, I'll put it on your dress, all right?
Promise you'll wear it into the arena, Katniss?
Getting a knife should be pretty easy, but you've got to get your hands on a bow.
Even a weak bow is better than no bow at all.
I don't even know if there'll be wood,
Since that year half of them died of cold.
You're the best hunter I know,
How different can it be, really?
Last time I saw him, he said he was going to take a nap,
Well, it's been an exhausting day,
At least, you two have decent manners,
The pair last year ate everything with their hands like a couple of savages.
Your mentor has a lot to learn about presentation.
How odd you two find it amusing.
You know your mentor is your lifeline to the world in these Games.
The one who advises you, lines up your sponsors, and dictates the presentation of any gifts.
Haymitch can well be the difference between your life and your death!
Let's get you back to your room,
I can send one of the Capitol people to help you.
What other food can we find?
I just have to remember them.
As long as you can find yourself, you'll never starve.
It's going to be a big, big, big day!
I won't unless I bring it home.
So, you're supposed to give us advice,
Did I actually get a pair of fighters this year?
The audience will think you've mixed it up with another tribute before you've even made it to the arena.
That bruise will say you fought, you weren't caught, even better,
Can you hit anything with that knife besides a table?
And once the stylists get hold of you, you'll be attractive enough.
All right, I'll make a deal with you.
You don't interfere with my drinking, and I'll stay sober enough to help you,
But you have to do exactly what I say.
When we get to the arena, what's the best strategy at the Cornucopia for someone—
In a few minutes, we'll be pulling into the station.
You'll be put in the hands of your stylists.
You're not going to like what they do to you.
But no matter what it is, don't resist,
One of them may be rich.
If there's one thing we can't stand, it's a whiner.
You almost look like a human being now!
We don't have much cause to look nice in District Twelve.
Of course, you don't, you poor darling!
By the time Cinna is through with you, you're going to be absolutely gorgeous!
You know, now that we've gotten rid of all the hair and filth, you're not horrible at all!
Just give me a moment, all right?
And in almost perfect balance with your profile.
I don't think I've seen you before,
Yes, this is my first year in the Games,
So they gave you District Twelve,
Why don't you put on your robe and we'll have a chat.
How despicable we must seem to you,
So, Katniss, about your costume for the opening ceremonies.
My partner, Portia, is the stylist for your fellow tribute, Peeta.
And our current thought is to dress you in complementary costumes,
As you know, it's customary to reflect the flavor of the district.
So, I'll be in a coal miner outfit?
You see, Portia and I think that coal miner thing's very overdone.
No one will remember you in that.
And we both see it as our job to make the District Twelve tributes unforgettable,
So rather than focus on the coal mining itself, we're going to focus on the coal,
And what do we do with coal?
You're not afraid of fire, are you, Katniss?
It's not real flame, of course, just a little synthetic fire Portia and I came up with.
I want the audience to recognize you when you're in the arena,
Katniss, the girl who was on fire.
I'll rip off your cape if you'll rip off mine,
I know we promised Haymitch we'd do exactly what they said, but I don't think he considered this angle.
Isn't he supposed to protect us from this sort of thing?
With all that alcohol in him, it's probably not advisable to have him around an open flame,
I think he said for us to hold hands,
No, don't let go of me,
I might fall out of this thing.
Thanks for keeping hold of me.
I was getting a little shaky there,
I'm sure they didn't notice anything but you.
You should wear flames more often,
Because, of course, Haymitch hasn't bothered to tell me your strategies.
But I've done my best with what I had to work with.
How Katniss sacrificed herself for her sister.
How you've both successfully struggled to overcome the barbarism of your district.
Unfortunately, I can't seal the sponsor deals for you.
But don't worry, I'll get him to the table at gunpoint if necessary.
That's the last thing I wa—oh!
How could you possibly know an Avox?
They cut her tongue so she can't speak,
She's probably a traitor of some sort.
And even if you did, you're not to speak to one of them unless it's to give an order,
Of course, you don't really know her.
No, I guess not, I just—
I kept thinking she looked familiar as well.
Then I realized she's a dead ringer for Delly.
Of course, that's who I was thinking of.
And yes, the cake has spirits, but all the alcohol has burned off.
I ordered it specially in honor of your fiery debut.
Whose idea was the hand holding?
Just the perfect touch of rebellion,
Tomorrow morning is the first training session.
Meet me for breakfast and I'll tell you exactly how I want you to play it,
Now go get some sleep while the grown-ups talk.
Have you been on the roof yet?
You can practically see the whole city.
The wind's a bit loud, though.
No one will overhear us talking
I asked Cinna why they let us up here.
Weren't they worried that some of the tributes might decide to jump right over the side?
Some kind of electric field throws you back on the roof.
Do you think they're watching us now?
We were hunting in the woods one day.
Suddenly all the birds stopped singing at once.
As if it were giving a warning call.
I'm sure it was the same girl.
They had dark circles under their eyes from no sleep.
They were running as if their lives depended on it,
The hovercraft appeared out of nowhere,
I mean, one moment the sky was empty and the next it was there.
It didn't make a sound, but they saw it.
A net dropped down on the girl and carried her up, fast, so fast like the elevator.
They shot some sort of spear through the boy.
It was attached to a cable and they hauled him up as well.
But I'm certain he was dead.
We heard the girl scream once.
Then it was gone, the hovercraft.
And the birds began to sing again, as if nothing had happened.
We were under a shelf of rock,
Where do you suppose they were going?
Or why they would leave here.
I'd go home now if they let me.
But you have to admit, the food's prime.
He's the one who took your sister away at the reaping?
I hear the girls talk about him a lot.
I thought he was your cousin or something.
Did he come to say good-bye to you?
Well, he likes you and your sister.
I think he wishes he had a daughter instead of a houseful of boys.
He knew your mother when they were kids,
See you in the morning then.
I was supposed to get those back to Cinna.
Can you take them to him?
So, let's get down to business.
First off, if you like, I'll coach you separately.
Why would you coach us separately?
Say if you had a secret skill you might not want the other to know about,
I don't have any secret skills,
And I already know what yours is, right?
I mean, I've eaten enough of your squirrels.
All right, so give me some idea of what you can do,
I already know you're handy with a knife,
He always comments on how the arrows never pierce the body.
She hits every one in the eye.
It's the same with the rabbits she sells the butcher.
She can even bring down deer.
If he's going to help you, he has to know what you're capable of.
I've seen you in the market.
You can lift hundredpound bags of flour,
Yes, and I'm sure the arena will be full of bags of flour for me to chuck at people.
It's not like being able to use a weapon.
He came in second in our school competition last year, only after his brother.
How many times have you seen someone wrestle someone to death?
All you need is to come up with a knife, and you'll at least stand a chance.
If I get jumped, I'm dead!
You'll be living up in some tree eating raw squirrels and picking off people with arrows.
You know what my mother said to me when she came to say good-bye, as if to cheer me up, she says maybe District Twelve will finally have a winner.
Then I realized, she didn't mean me, she meant you!
She said, ‘She's a survivor, that one.
But only because someone helped me.
People will help you in the arena.
They'll be tripping over each other to sponsor you.
Katniss, there's no guarantee they'll be bows and arrows in the arena, but during your private session with the Gamemakers, show them what you can do.
Until then, stay clear of archery.
Are you any good at trapping?
I know a few basic snares,
That may be significant in terms of food,
And Peeta, she's right, never underestimate strength in the arena.
Very often, physical power tilts the advantage to a player.
In the Training Center, they will have weights, but don't reveal how much you can lift in front of the other tributes.
The plan's the same for both of you.
Spend the time trying to learn something you don't know.
Learn to tie a decent knot.
Save showing what you're best at until your private sessions.
In public, I want you by each other's side every minute,
You agreed to do as I said!
You will be together, you will appear amiable to each other.
Meet Effie at the elevator at ten for training.
Where would you like to start?
The iced ones, for the bakery,
If only you could frost someone to death,
You can never tell what you'll find in the arena.
Say it's actually a gigantic cake—
Okay, now laugh as if I've said something funny.
All right, I'll keep smiling pleasantly and you talk,
Did I ever tell you about the time I was chased by a bear?
I think we have a shadow.
What can we do about it?
Someone ought to get Haymitch a drink.
Don't let's pretend when there's no one around.
Remember what Haymitch said about being sure to throw the weights.
Okay, enough small talk, just how bad were you today?
I don't know that it mattered.
By the time I showed up, no one even bothered to look at me.
They were singing some kind of drinking song, I think.
So, I threw around some heavy objects until they told me I could go.
I shot an arrow at the Gamemakers.
I shot an arrow at them.
It's like Peeta said, I was shooting and they were ignoring me and I just... I just lost my head, so I shot an apple out of their stupid roast pig's mouth!
Do you think they'll arrest me?
Be a pain to replace you at this stage,
See they'd have to reveal what happened in the Training Center for it to have any worthwhile effect on the population.
People would need to know what you did.
But they can't since it's secret, so it'd be a waste of effort,
More likely they'll make your life hell in the arena.
Well, they've already promised to do that to us any way,
One man tripped backward into a bowl of punch.
It's their job to pay attention to you.
And just because you come from District Twelve is no excuse to ignore you.
I'm sorry, but that's what I think,
I'll get a very bad score,
Scores only matter if they're very good, no one pays much attention to the bad or mediocre ones.
For all they know, you could be hiding your talents to get a low score on purpose.
I hope that's how people interpret the four I'll probably get,
Really, is anything less impressive than watching a person pick up a heavy ball and throw it a couple of yards.
One almost landed on my foot.
They've got a show to put on.
They need some players with some heat.
Katniss, the girl who was on fire,
Oh, wait until you see your interview dress.
Well, Catnip, stealing's punishable by death, or hadn't you heard?
I just wanted to look at your snare.
So where'd you get the squirrel?
Just remember, stealing's punishable by death.
Well, there's some room for improvement there.
You're coaching us on interviews today, right?
You don't have to wait until I'm done.
I can listen and cat at the same time,
Well, there's been a change of plans.
Peeta has asked to be coached separately.
You'll each have four hours with Effie for presentation and four with me for content,
Well, that's the best I can do,
Just remember, Katniss, you want the audience to like you.
And you don't think they will?
Not if you glare at them the entire time.
Why don't you save that for the arena?
Instead, think of yourself among friends,
They're betting on how long I'll live!
I'm smiling at you even though you're aggravating me.
I'm trying to figure out what to do with you,
How we're going to present you.
Are you going to be charming?
So far, you're shining like a star.
You volunteered to save your sister.
You've got the top training score.
People are intrigued, but no one knows who you are.
The impression you make tomorrow will decide exactly what I can get you in terms of sponsors,
Or am I not allowed to ask?
He has a sort of self-deprecating humor naturally,
Whereas when you open your mouth, you come across more as sullen and hostile.
I don't know where you pulled that cheery, wavy girl on the chariot from, but I haven't seen her before or since,
And you've given me so many reasons to be cheery,
But you don't have to please me.
I'm not going to sponsor you.
We've got to find another angle.
Not only are you hostile, I don't know anything about you.
I've asked you fifty questions and still have no sense of your life, your family, what you care about.
They want to know about you, Katniss.
But I don't want them to!
They can't have the things that mattered to me in the past!
You've got about as much charm as a dead slug,
That you can't believe a little girl from District Twelve has done this well.
The whole thing's been more than you ever could have dreamed of.
If you won't talk about yourself, at least compliment the audience.
Just keep turning it back around, all right.
Just answer the questions and try not to let the audience see how openly you despise them.
I should have tried to save you,
So, all ready for the interview then?
Haymitch called me a dead slug.
No matter what we tried, I couldn't do it.
I just can't be one of those people he wants me to be,
Why don't you just be yourself?
Haymitch says I'm sullen and hostile,
You even won over the Gamemakers.
And as for the citizens of the Capitol, well, they can't stop talking about you.
No one can help but admire your spirit.
Suppose, when you answer the questions, you think you're addressing a friend back home.
Who would your best friend be?
Only it doesn't make sense, Cinna.
I would never be telling Gale those things about me.
Could you think of me as a friend?
I'll be sitting on the main platform with the other stylists.
You'll be able to look right at me.
When you're asked a question, find me, and answer it as honestly as possible,
Even if what I think is horrible?
Especially if what you think is horrible,
Remember, you're still a happy pair.
And if they can't catch me, they can't kill me.
I wouldn't in a million years,
So, Katniss, the Capitol must be quite a change from District Twelve.
What's impressed you most since you arrived here?
What's impressed you most since you arrived here?
The one with the dried plums?
Oh, I eat it by the bucketful.
When you came out in the opening ceremonies, my heart actually stopped.
What did you think of that costume?
You mean after I got over my fear of being burned alive?
I thought Cinna was brilliant and it was the most gorgeous costume I'd ever seen and I couldn't believe I was wearing it.
I can't believe I'm wearing this, either.
Can't have you following in your mentor's footsteps.
So, how about that training score.
Give us a hint what happened in there.
Um... all I can say, is I think it was a first.
I'm not supposed to talk about it, right?
Let's go back then, to the moment they called your sister's name at the reaping,
Can you tell us about her?
And I love her more than anything.
What did she say to you?
She asked me to try really hard to win.
Best of luck, Katniss Everdeen, tribute from District Twelve.
Tell me, do I still smell like roses?
There must be some special girl.
Well, there is this one girl.
I've had a crush on her ever since I can remember.
But I'm pretty sure she didn't know I was alive until the reaping.
I don't know, but a lot of boys like her,
She can't turn you down then, eh?
I don't think it's going to work out.
Winning... won't help in my case,
Because... because... she came here with me.
Oh, that is a piece of bad luck,
Well, I don't think any of us can blame you.
It'd be hard not to fall for that young lady,
Wouldn't you love to pull her back out here and get a response?
Sadly, rules are rules, and Katniss Everdeen's time has been spent.
Well, best of luck to you, Peeta Mellark, and I think I speak for all of Panem when I say our hearts go with yours.
No right to go saying those things about me!
This was your idea, wasn't it?
Turning me into some kind of fool in front of the entire country?
Haymitch just helped me with it.
Do you think he hurt you?
That boy just gave you something you could never achieve on your own.
And let's face it, you can use all the help you can get in that department.
You were about as romantic as dirt until he said he wanted you.
The star-crossed lovers from District Twelve!
The most I could say about you after your interview was that you were nice enough, although that in itself was a small miracle.
Now I can say you're a heartbreaker.
Oh, oh, oh, how the boys back home fall longingly at your feet.
Which do you think will get you more sponsors?
I should have been told, so I didn't look so stupid.
If you'd known, it wouldn't have read as real,
She's just worried about her boyfriend,
But I bet he's smart enough to know a bluff when he sees it.
Besides you didn't say you loved me.
After he said he loved me, did you think I could be in love with him, too?
The way you avoided looking at the cameras, the blush.
You're going to have sponsors lined up around the block,
I wouldn't be at all surprised if I finally get promoted to a decent district next year!
When the gong sounds, get the hell out of there.
You're neither of you up to the blood bath at the Cornucopia.
Just clear out, put as much distance as you can between yourselves and the others, and find a source of water,
You should be getting some sleep.
I didn't want to miss the party.
With all the crazy clothes they wear here.
All I can do is wonder about tomorrow.
I really am sorry about your hands.
I've never been a contender in these Games anyway.
That's no way to be thinking,
My best hope is to not disgrace myself and...
I don't know how to say it exactly.
Only... I want to die as myself.
I don't want them to change me in there.
Turn me into some kind of monster that I'm not.
Do you mean you won't kill anyone?
No, when the time comes, I'm sure I'll kill just like everybody else.
I can't go down without a fight.
Only I keep wishing I could think of a way to... to show the Capitol they don't own me.
That I'm more than just a piece in their Games,
Okay, but within that framework, there's still you, there's still me,
Only... no offense, but who cares, Peeta?
I mean, what else am I allowed to care about at this point?
Look, if you want to spend the last hours of your life planning some noble death in the arena, that's your choice.
I want to spend mine in District Twelve.
Wouldn't surprise me if you do,
Give my mother my best when you make it back, will you?
The material in the jacket's designed to reflect body heat.
Off the green outfit you wore on the train,
It barely cleared the review board.
Some thought the pin could be used as a weapon, giving you an unfair advantage.
But eventually, they let it through,
They eliminated a ring from that District One girl, though.
If you twisted the gemstone, a spike popped out.
She claimed she had no knowledge the ring transformed and there was no way to prove she did.
Then there's nothing to do but wait for the call,
Unless you think you could eat any more?
Do you want to talk, Katniss?
I'm not allowed to bet, but if I could, my money would be on you.
Ladies and gentlemen, let the Seventy-fourth Hunger Games begin!
Just clear out, put as much distance as you can between yourselves and the others, and find a source of water.
Twelve down and eleven to go!
Better clear out so they can get the body before it starts stinking.
Shouldn't we have heard a cannon by now?
Nothing to prevent them from going in immediately.
Yeah, we don't want to have to track her down twice.
I'll go finish her and let's move on!
Why don't we just kill him now and get it over with?
And he's handy with that knife.
Besides, he's our best chance of finding her.
You think she bought into that sappy romance stuff?
Every time I think about her spinning around in that dress, I want to puke.
Wish we knew how she got that eleven.
Katniss, the girl who was on fire.
It's been a bit warm for my taste,
Why don't you come on up?
I'll do better with my sword.
Oh, let her stay up there.
It's not like she's going anywhere.
We'll deal with her in the morning.
What are you still doing here?
We could do it, you know.
You and I, we could make it.
You know, they're not the only ones who can form alliances,
You want me for an ally?
You saved me with those tracker jackers.
You're smart enough to still be alive.
And I can't seem to shake you anyway,
Come on then, I've had two kills today.
We all carry them when we work in the orchards.
They left a lot of nests there,
There are a lot here, too.
That must be how you can fly around the trees like you've got wings.
Lucky you had the sense to pull the stingers out or you'd be a lot worse.
The closer we get to the end, the more people will realize how clever you are.
You weren't joking, about wanting me for an ally?
I've never had a whole leg to myself before.
Now that I've got a bow and arrows, I can get more.
I can show you how to set them,
It will only keep a few days anyway, and we've got the whole bird plus the rabbit.
I'd have thought, in District Eleven, you'd have a bit more to eat than us.
You know, since you grow the food,
Oh, no, we're not allowed to eat the crops.
They whip you and make everyone else watch,
The mayor's very strict about it.
Do you get all the coal you want?
Just what we buy and whatever we track in on our boots.
They feed us a bit extra during harvest, so that people can keep going longer,
Don't you have to be in school?
Oh, yes, we have them back home.
I've been eating them for days,
but I had to get away from the Cornucopia fast.
They don't block the sun and they make it harder to see,
These aren't for sun, they're for darkness,
Sometimes, when we harvest through the night, they'll pass out a few pairs to those of us highest in the trees.
One time, this boy Martin, he tried to keep his pair.
They killed him on the spot.
They killed a boy for taking these?
Yes, and everyone knew he was no danger.
Martin wasn't right in the head.
I mean, he still acted like a three-year-old.
He just wanted the glasses to play with,
They let you see in complete darkness,
Try them tonight when the sun goes down.
I have these for my hands.
You can share my sleeping bag if you want.
Rue, I only woke up today.
How many nights did I miss?
The girls from Districts One and Four are dead.
At least, I think it did.
It might have been the tracker jacker venom making me imagine things,
You know the boy from my district?
I think he saved my life.
But he was with the Careers.
I've spied on their base camp by the lake.
They made it back before they collapsed from the stingers.
Maybe he did save you and had to run.
If he did, it was all probably just part of his act.
You know, to make people think he's in love with me.
I didn't think that was an act.
He worked it out with our mentor.
I wonder who else got a pair of these,
But they've got everything down by the lake,
I mean, it's the Hunger Games, right?
I think we're going to have to fix that, Rue.
Who do you think that was?
It could have been any of the others,
Wait, and the boy from Ten, the one with the bad leg.
I wonder how that last one died,
There's a marshy area over that way.
Today we take out the Careers’ food,
Come on, we'll figure out a plan while we hunt,
Yes, he stays at the camp full-time.
He got stung, too, when they drew the tracker jackers in by the lake,
I guess they agreed to let him live if he acted as their guard.
Not much that I could see.
He might be able to hold a few of us off with that, but Thresh could kill him easily,
And the food's just out in the open?
Something's not quite right about that whole setup.
But I couldn't tell what exactly,
Katniss, even if you could get to the food, how would you get rid of it?
Don't worry, I'll think of something.
Destroying things is much easier than making them.
You have a lot of time for that?
That's why I love your pin,
I have a few that are my special friends.
We can sing back and forth for hours.
I'm usually up highest, so I'm the first to see the flag that signals quitting time.
There's a special little song I do,
And the mockingjays spread it around the orchard.
That's how everyone knows to knock off,
They can be dangerous though, if you get too near their nests.
But you can't blame them for that.
It has more meaning for you than me.
I like to see it on you.
That's how I decided I could trust you.
Maybe you should just stick with that.
Not if I pick up another bag down by the lake,
You know, stealing isn't illegal here,
But if you hear the mockingjays singing it, you'll know I'm okay, only I can't get back right away.
If all goes according to plan, I'll see you for dinner,
We need him in the woods, and his job's done here anyway.
No one can touch those supplies,
I keep telling you, forget about him.
I know where I cut him.
It's a miracle he hasn't bled to death yet.
At any rate, he's in no shape to raid us,
When we find her, I kill her in my own way, and no one interferes.
Going to win for both of us now,
Only I keep wishing I could think of a way to... to show the Capital they don't own me.
That I'm more than just a piece in their Games.
We don't have to worry about her now.
My thanks to the people of District Eleven,
Now you have to sit up, Katniss.
Now you have to drink water, Katniss.
Now you have to sort the packs, Katniss.
How different can it be, really?
You here to finish me off, sweetheart?
I guess all those hours decorating cakes paid off.
The final defense of the dying.
We're on the same team now, you know,
Nice of you to find what's left of me.
Let's get you in the stream, wash you off so I can see what kind of wounds you've got,
Remember, we're madly in love, so it's all right to kiss me anytime you feel like it.

’ And he said, ‘Because when he sings... even the birds stop to listen.
